description:
How many of you have an app that is not doing great in the app store?

We know thousands of apps that are in fact ... not great.

What if we can pimp the app and make it better for less than $100 ?

What if we could outsource the whole process?

What if we could use app marketing ninja mindset to pimp the app, cheap, fast and ultra effective.

This is a QUICK, FAST, and Fun course.

Enjoy it, see how we did it... learn the little tips and go out there and pimp your App!
title: App Marketing - How to Pimp Your App
